EmailTemplate.name: Virtual VMUG Email.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Virtual VMUG, Tues Jan 21st
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Mark Your Calendars for Tuesday, Jan 21 We'll be there. Would b gr8 2 c u.
VMTurbo engineers will be on hand to discuss virtualization management and answer questions about latest release:
- Control modules for NetApp, EMC, and Cisco UCS that allow you to manage and control your fabric and storage - Distribute loads across all hosts in your environment by eliminating artificial cluster boundaries - allowing for even greater utilization and densities while assuring VM performance - Full stack control for your software-defined datacenter
Register Now http://bit.ly/191vZFt
